## Installation

Install or upgrade using pip:

```bash
pip install --upgrade claude-worktree
```

Or using uv:

```bash
uv tool install claude-worktree --upgrade
```

## Documentation

Full documentation available at: https://github.com/DaveDev42/claude-worktree
